title: Bill Carstanjen and The Kentucky Derby
itunes:title: Bill Carstanjen and The Kentucky Derby
description:
Join Mike Lynch and Michael Barr as they chat with Churchill Downs' CEO Bill Carstanjen about the upcoming Kentucky Derby, betting in horse racing and more on Business of Sports.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
